title: Living Life on Social Media & Becoming a STAR
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to bare it all, your entire life on Instagram, YouTube and TikTok? Well, this week, Tasia and Camo break down what it's like to post your life online, including dealing with the criticism and doubt. Plus, they give their best advice on advancing YOUR social media career, how to potentially land some brand deals, which platform is the best to try and get your start and whatever else you need to rocket yourself to stardom. This is some serious tea you won't want to miss.
Watch "Unfazed and Unbothered" on YouTube
As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/unfazed 
Follow Tasia on TikTok
Follow Camo on TikTok
Follow Tasia on IG
Follow Camo on IG
Follow Camo on YouTube
Listen to Camo's music on Spotify
